paramInformation.label: Customer Function
paramInformation.description: Customer function switch, using bit control

paramInformation.label: Auto Report Battery Time
paramInformation.description: The interval time for auto report the battery level

metadata.inclusion: Press the button three times within 1.5 seconds.
metadata.exclusion: Press the button three times within 1.5 seconds.
metadata.reset:
1. Press the button four times within 1.5 seconds and hold on the fourth press until the red LED lights up.
2. After the red LED flashes 9 times, release the button within 2 seconds.
